scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:css:sass && npm run build:sass && npm run build:less && npm run build:stylus
scripts.build:css:sass: mkdir -p dist && node-sass src/sass/requiem.scss dist/requiem.css --output-style=expanded --include-path=src/sass && node-sass src/sass/requiem.scss dist/requiem.min.css --output-style=compressed --include-path=src/sass
scripts.build:css:less: mkdir -p dist && lessc src/less/requiem.less dist/requiem.css --include-path=src/less && lessc src/less/requiem.less dist/requiem.min.css --include-path=src/less --compress
scripts.build:css:stylus: mkdir -p dist && stylus src/stylus/requiem.styl -o dist/requiem.css -I src/stylus --include-css && stylus src/stylus/requiem.styl -o dist/requiem.min.css -I src/stylus --include-css -c
scripts.docs: npm run clean:docs && npm run build:docs
scripts.play: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run clean:play && npm run build:play:templates && npm run serve:play
